english_translation: Why do you grieve saying, 'I am just a drop of water'?
When you merge with the universe, you are that ocean!

kannada_original: ನೀ ಕೊಂಬೆ, ಮರ ನೀನೆ ; ನೀ ಬೇರು, ನೀ ಚಿಗುರು !
english_transliteration: Nī kombe, mara nīne; nī bēru, nī ciguru!
english_translation: You are the branch, you are the tree; you are the root, you are the sprout!
Keep moving towards the void (Absolute) – Muddu Rāma.
